entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
